items.name: Training Sword
items.description: A well-worn wooden sword used for practice. Despite being made of wood, it's surprisingly sturdy.
items.lore_text: Every warrior's journey begins with a simple wooden sword.

items.name: Practice Shield
items.description: A small wooden shield with leather straps. Perfect for learning defensive techniques.
items.lore_text: A reliable shield that has protected many apprentices during training.

items.name: Healing Potion
items.description: A small vial filled with red liquid that glows faintly. It smells of herbs and magic.
items.lore_text: A basic healing potion brewed by the training grounds' alchemist.

items.name: Hemp Rope
items.description: A sturdy 50-foot coil of hemp rope. Essential for climbing and various other tasks.
items.lore_text: Strong rope that has helped countless trainees overcome obstacles.

items.name: Torch
items.description: A wooden torch wrapped in cloth and soaked in oil. Provides light and can be used as a weapon.
items.lore_text: A simple torch that illuminates the darkest corners of the training grounds.

items.name: Training Key
items.description: A bronze key that opens practice chests and locked doors in the training facility.
items.lore_text: This key opens many doors in the training grounds, but not all secrets.

items.name: Practice Arrows
items.description: Blunt-tipped arrows designed for training. They won't cause serious injury but still hurt.
items.lore_text: Arrows designed to teach accuracy without causing permanent harm.

items.name: Training Bow
items.description: A simple wooden bow with moderate draw weight. Perfect for learning archery basics.
items.lore_text: A reliable bow that has taught many students the art of archery.

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A well-crafted iron sword with a sharp edge. A significant upgrade from wooden training weapons.
items.lore_text: A real weapon for those who have proven themselves in training.

items.name: Apprentice Robes
items.description: Simple brown robes worn by training grounds apprentices. Provides basic protection.
items.lore_text: The humble beginning of every adventurer's wardrobe.
